parameters.name: ClientRequestToken
parameters.description: Each resource must have a unique client request token. The client token is used to implement idempotency. It ensures that the request completes no more than one time. If you retry a request with the same token and the same parameters, the request will complete successfully. However, if you try to create a new resource using the same token but different parameters, an HTTP 409 conflict occurs. If you omit this value, AWS SDKs will automatically generate a unique client request. For more information about idempotency, see Ensuring idempotency in Amazon EC2 API requests. This field is autopopulated if not provided.

parameters.name: LoRaWAN
parameters.description: The LoRaWAN information used with a FUOTA task. RfRegion (string) --- Supported RfRegions.

parameters.name: FirmwareUpdateImage
parameters.description: The S3 URI points to a firmware update image that is to be used with a FUOTA task.

parameters.name: FirmwareUpdateRole
parameters.description: The firmware update role that is to be used with a FUOTA task.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tag to attach to the specified resource. Tags are metadata that you can use to manage a resource. (dict) --- A simple label consisting of a customer-defined key-value pair The tag's key value. The tag's value.

parameters.name: FragmentIntervalMS
parameters.description: The interval for sending fragments in milliseconds, rounded to the nearest second.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The arn of a FUOTA task.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The ID of a FUOTA task.
